title: Shell Sheller
desc:
Post 125
- Destroys the shell in the chamber position equivalent to the turn order position of the target this was fired at (i.e. if fired at the person who goes 3rd, this destroys the third shell in the chamber)
- Cannot appear as any of the last x shells in the chamber, x being the # of players.
- Activates **Safe** regardless of the target fired at.
